value.title: IBM explores AI tools to spot, cut bias in online ad targeting
value.excerpt: IBM Corp is developing tools that would ensure online advertising algorithms do not unfairly show ads to only specific groups such as mostly men or wealthy people, aiming to address discrimination concerns that have drawn industrywide scrutiny.
